text: The Filmakademie Baden-Wuerttemberg (German: Filmakademie Baden-W端rttemberg) is a movie school in Ludwigsburg, Baden-W端rttemberg, Germany, founded in 1991. It is funded by the government, making it a public university. Category:1991 establishments in Germany Category:Colleges and universities in Baden- W端rttemberg
